trans-unit.source: Defines the available system gestures.
trans-unit.target: 定义可用的系统笔势。

trans-unit.source: When the operating system recognizes system gestures, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当操作系统是否能够识别系统笔势<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: Many of the gestures map to traditional mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 许多笔势映射的传统鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Tap system gesture mimics a single left-click on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 例如，点击系统笔势会模拟鼠标单击鼠标左键。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines which type of system gesture that raised the <xref:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Tap> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例确定哪种类型的系统笔势会引发<xref:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Tap>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkcanvas1` and that <xref:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture> is connected to the event handler below.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkcanvas1`且<xref:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture>连接到下的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Maps to a left drag on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 映射为向左拖动鼠标。

trans-unit.source: Occurs with a short, quick stroke that translates into a specific command.
trans-unit.target: 使用会转换为特定命令的短、快笔画时引发。

trans-unit.source: The action taken by a flick is set system-wide.
trans-unit.target: 笔画执行的操作是在系统级设置的。

trans-unit.source: An application can listen for a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Flick" /> and prevent it from becoming one of the standard <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands" /> by setting the <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled" /> property to true in the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以侦听 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.SystemGesture.Flick" />，并通过将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands" /> 事件中的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled" /> 属性设置为 true，来阻止其成为标准的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture" /> 之一。

trans-unit.source: Only Windows Vista supports flicks.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Windows Vista 支持笔势。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that press and hold has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指示发生按住操作。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现。

trans-unit.source: Maps to a mouse hover.
trans-unit.target: 映射为鼠标悬停。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to show ToolTip rollover effects, or other mouse hover behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于显示工具提示翻转效果，或其他鼠标悬停行为。

trans-unit.source: Maps to a mouse leaving a hover.
trans-unit.target: 映射为鼠标离开悬停。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to end ToolTip rollover effects or other mouse hover behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于关闭工具提示翻转效果，或其他鼠标悬停行为。

trans-unit.source: No system gesture.
trans-unit.target: 无系统笔势。

trans-unit.source: Maps to a right drag on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 映射为向右拖动鼠标。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to drag an object or selection to a different area and is followed by the appearance of the shortcut menu which provides options for moving the object.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于将对象或选择内容拖动到其他区域，然后显示快捷菜单，其中提供用于移动对象的选项。

trans-unit.source: Maps to a right-click on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 映射为鼠标右击。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to show a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 可用于显示快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: Maps to a left-click on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 映射为鼠标的左键单击。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to choose a command from the menu or toolbar, take action if a command is chosen, set an insertion point, or show selection feedback.
trans-unit.target: 可用于选择菜单或工具栏的命令、对已选择的命令采取操作、设置插入点或显示选择的反馈。

trans-unit.source: Maps to a double-click of a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 映射为鼠标双击。
